thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Thursday, 15 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Canada home sales drop in January as new rules take effect-CREA

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Canada home sales drop in January as new rules take effect-CREA
text:
OTTAWA, Feb 15 (Reuters) - Resales of Canadian homes dropped 14.5 percent in January from December to the lowest monthly level in three years as tighter mortgage rules doused demand, the Canadian Real Estate Association said on Thursday.
The industry group said actual sales, not seasonally adjusted, fell 2.4 percent from January 2017, while home prices were up 7.7 percent from a year earlier, according to the groupâ€™s home price index. (Reporting by Andrea Hopkins; Editing by Bernadette Baum)
